ModMetaData.name: World Map Polluted Tiles - Improved Visibility
ModMetaData.author: Araylie
ModMetaData.description:
Araylie's Rimworld Custom Mod - World Map Polluted Tiles - Improved Visibility #arcm #biotech #wmptiv #climatechange #qol #colorblind #visual
Can't see where the polluted tiles are? No? Well this simple retexture mod is just for you! It makes the world map polluted tiles more visible! Pollution is no longer shy to show itself to the rimworld!
"Oh sweet, this is a nice spot to start a new colony!" "WARNING: THIS TILE IS NEAR POLLUTED TILE[...]" "What the... DANGIT! Fine, here instead!" "WARNING: THIS TILE IS NEAR POLLUTED TILE[...]" "WHERE'S THE POLLUTION?!"
If you are curious about the world map in the previews: Seed: corruption Pollution: 40% Pollution range: 0% - 100%
Mods used for the previews: [1.3 - 1.5] PublisherPlus FORK / 3000540696
